name: Untitled Magnet Game
description:
Hey there!

This is a very early build of my Untitled Magnet Game, as seen in episode four of my YouTube series "Developing". It's a minimum viable product, developed with the intention of gathering community feedback before I take development forward.

Please note: I highly recommend the use of a controller. Xbox One and Series X, PlayStation 4, and Switch Pro controllers have all been tested as working.

Keyboard controls do work, but aren't ideal. If that's all you've got, they are as follows:

  • WASD - Move
  • Space - Jump
  • K - Pickup/Put Down Magnet
  • Left Shift - Aim, with direction
  • WASD,Q,E - Direction

Also, accessibility features and options will be added in future versions of the full game.

Thanks for playing!

Music and sound effects courtesy of Epidemic Sound - https://www.epidemicsound.com/referral/vtdu5y
